description.value:
Accustomed to a calm life in the hills, your people find rest and relaxation especially replenishing, particularly when indulging in creature comforts. When you regain Hit Points overnight, add [[/r @actor.level]]{add your level} to the Hit Points regained.

When anyone uses the Medicine skill to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds]{Treat your Wounds}, you can eat a snack to [[/r @actor.level]]{add your level} to the Hit Points you regain from their treatment.
